name: RPG Prototype (Marxy 37)
description:
RPG Prototype

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • Mouse: Rotate Player
  • Left Mouse: Attack
  • Tab/Scroll Wheel: Change Weapon
  • E: Interact
  • Escape: Pause
  • Q (In the pause menu/death screen): Return To Menu

(I suggest to lower the music volume in the Setting page, since it's a bit loud as it is right now 😕)

DESCRIPTION:

A short game prototype made for the Secret Santa Jam for Kijin Sora by Marxy 37. Defeat enemies until you can level up and go up to the next floor: Is that simple... (Or is it?? 🤔) Can you reach the crown?? 

A SHORT LETTER TO KIJIN SORA:

"Hi Kijin Sora. Your santa here 🎅

Sorry if this isn't exactly the game you was hoping for 🙇‍♂️: I had a cool story planned and many other big plans for the game, but unfortunately i had to cut most of it, in order to focus on the main core experience. I've putted my best into this game, and I hope you'll like this short prototype. 

If there is a cool feature that you want to see into the game (maybe a special enemy or ability), feel free to DM me, and I'll try my best to implement it. It's a game for you after all 😊

With Love. -Marxy 37"
